unnormalised: Arre yaar, Mrs. Sharma ren kuri gidra baha hoyena! Aanjom keda jeta chalao thik geyang hoyena. Mr. ar Mrs. Verma hõ ol re tol re mena kitang, sobhaok kana. Even 'Kumar bhai' hõ daṛe hoyena, thik bangte hoṛ hopon serenj mena, bang ne? Mone hoyena ban jeta chalao thik geyang hoena, menkhan kamij taheng hoena. Asha mena thik bangte okoy ge jeta joloṛ hoyena.
